item.title: About
item.description:
About Kris Yotam ðŸ”—

I’m Kris Yotam, a Software Architect with a passion for technology and innovation. This page serves as a brief introduction to who I am and what I do. My goal here is to employ the Feynman Technique, as I have in all my past and future blogs. I will try to explain things as clearly as possible, using simple terms. If you have any further questions, don’t hesitate to reach out to me on Twitter @krisyotam.

Feel free to browse through the posts to learn more about my work and interests.

item.title: Software Development
item.description:
Software Development ðŸ”—

This page lists all posts related to Software Development. Explore articles, insights, and tutorials on various aspects of software engineering and development practices.

Posts ðŸ”—

  • Introduction to Agile Methodologies: An overview of Agile methodologies and their impact on software development processes.
  • Best Practices in Code Reviews: Tips and techniques for conducting effective code reviews to improve code quality.
  • How to Implement CI/CD Pipelines: A guide to setting up Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines for your projects.

item.title: Tags
item.description:
This page lists all the tags used on my blog. Tags help categorize and organize content for easier navigation.

Popular Tags ðŸ”—

  • Software Development: Articles related to software engineering and development practices.
  • Technology Trends: Posts about the latest trends and innovations in technology.
  • Personal Reflections: Insights and thoughts on various personal and professional topics.
  • Data Science: Posts related to data analysis, machine learning, and related fields.
  • Web Development: Articles focusing on building and maintaining websites.
  • Career Advice: Insights and tips for professional growth and career planning.

Hardware ðŸ”—

  • Microcontrollers: Posts on programming and using microcontrollers.
  • Embedded Systems: Articles on designing and working with embedded hardware.
  • Hardware Design: Insights into hardware design and prototyping.

Web Development ðŸ”—

  • Front-end Frameworks: Explore popular front-end frameworks like React and Vue.js.
  • Back-end Development: Articles on server-side programming and back-end technologies.
  • Responsive Design: Tips and techniques for creating responsive web designs.

Software Architecture ðŸ”—

  • Design Patterns: Explore various design patterns used in software architecture.
  • Microservices: Articles on building and managing microservices.
  • Architecture Best Practices: Tips and best practices for effective software architecture.

Systems Development ðŸ”—

  • Embedded Systems: Posts on developing software for embedded systems.
  • System Integration: Articles on integrating various systems and components.
  • Real-time Systems: Insights into developing systems with real-time constraints.

Software Engineering ðŸ”—

  • Agile Methodologies: Information on agile practices and methodologies.
  • Version Control: Posts about managing code changes and version control systems.
  • Code Reviews: Best practices and tips for effective code reviews.

Machine Learning ðŸ”—

  • Supervised Learning: Articles on supervised learning techniques and algorithms.
  • Neural Networks: Insights into neural network architectures and applications.
  • Natural Language Processing: Posts on techniques and tools for NLP.

Penetration Testing ðŸ”—

  • Network Security: Explore techniques and tools for network security assessment.
  • Vulnerability Assessment: Articles on identifying and assessing vulnerabilities.
  • Ethical Hacking: Insights and practices for ethical hacking and security testing.

CyberSecurity ðŸ”—

  • Threat Intelligence: Posts on understanding and analyzing cybersecurity threats.
  • Incident Response: Articles on responding to and managing security incidents.
  • Security Policies: Information on creating and enforcing security policies.

Bug Bounty ðŸ”—

  • Bug Bounty Programs: Insights into participating in and managing bug bounty programs.
  • Exploitation Techniques: Articles on various exploitation techniques and methodologies.
  • Reporting Vulnerabilities: Best practices for reporting discovered vulnerabilities.
